title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com> wrote in the message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The combo box editor in column two of the property sheet grows to be the width of the largest item, causing the drop-down button to be too far right and off the visible area of the property sheet.
EB: The combo box editor in column two of the property sheet should resize itself to fit the width of the property sheet column, ensuring that the drop-down button is always visible.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a property sheet with a column containing ComboBoxCellEditor.
2. Make the strings in the combo box wider than the width of the property sheet column.
3. Observe that the drop-down button is clipped and not visible.

Expected behavior:
The combo box in the property sheet should resize itself to fit the width of the column, making the drop-down button always visible.
